metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2109 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The asn1_d2i_read_bio function in crypto/asn1/a_d2i_fp.c in the ASN.1 BIOimplementation in OpenSSL before 1.0.1t and 1.0.2 before 1.0.2h allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) via ashort invalid encoding.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2109` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libssl1.0.0 - 1.0.2g-1ubuntu5
openssl - 1.0.2g-1ubuntu5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openssl package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.2g-1ubuntu5').
